word_mean: 偶极子：这种分子有两个大小相等、符号相反的电荷，其正电荷中心与负电荷中心不重合，因而使分子带正负静电荷
一对保持短距离的电荷或磁极

sentence.Network_en: The dipole does not radiate energy in the direction of its axis.

sentence.Network_en: Only magnetic dipole and higher multipole configuratons occur in nature.
